page.title: 01GREENLOANING
page.content: Greenloaning is a small village with about 30 houses,10 farms,a hotel,a Little Chef restaurant and a riding school called The Scottish Equitation Centre. There was, until recently, a church but this has been converted into a dwelling house. The main railway line runs through the village but the station closed several years ago and these buildings too,have been converted into a house.Close by is the River Allan a fine river for fishing. Our school, Greenloaning Primary School is situated just off the A9, the main road to Perth and the North. At the moment there are 33 pupils in the school, 15 in the infant class Primary1,2&3,and 18 in Primary 4,5,6 & 7. There are only 2 classes . Farming is the only industry in the village, most people commute to work.
